lines.text: Oh Shit... Here Comes Trouble!
A man who loves, gives hostages to fortune.
No, Ritter. Not you.
No, Dr. Holland, not Ritter.
[voice changes]
Ritter, poor fellow, is long dead.
[removes his mask, showing that was Arcane all along]
You've heard of but never seen me, so I'll introduce myself. My name is Arcane.
I don't know where we are Toto, but it sure isn't Kansas.
Everything's a dream when you're alone.
[Jude has been brought back from the dead, and the first thing he sees is Swamp Thing]
Oh shit. There goes the neighborhood.
Where is he?
What is he?
Don't be afraid, Jude.
You better say that to somebody whose desk you ain't hiding behind.
What Bruno took was what changed me; it only amplifies your essence. It simply makes you more of what you already are.
Bruno's essence was stupidity.
Why doesn't Bruno have your strength?
Because he never had it.
The way out is through.

[Bruno has just been taken to the dungeon by another guard after drinking the formula]
Some friend you are!
Sorry, Bruno. It's every man for himself; God against all.
Much beauty in the swamp, if you only look.
